stash.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to store something secretly or safely somewhere
stash.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He has money stashed away in the Bahamas.
You can stash your gear in here.
stash.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: an amount of something that is kept in a secret place, especially money, weapons, or drugs
stash.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Mike went into the bedroom to check on his stash.
stash.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to store something, especially money, in a safe, often secret place
stash.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: He has money stashed away in the Bahamas.
The multi-millionaire apparently had Â£250 million stashed in overseas accounts.
